title: what is going on???
body: Home screen just shows play button and friends and chat but the rest is black plz fix asap!!!

replies.body:
It sounds like there's an issue with your connection to the server. I'd recommend checking your local network settings with our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure there isn't an issue there.

Let me know if those steps helped.
